API_Description: Gets the th word on the page.

nPage.description: (optional) The 0-based index of the page. The default is 0, the first page in the document.

nWord.description: (optional) The 0-based index of the word. The default is 0, the first word on the page.

bStrip.description: (optional) Specifies whether punctuation and white space should be removed from the word before returning. The default is true.

Returns: The th word on the page.
